arts.ttl: Serie A | Monza 1-2 Cagliari: Match Report
arts.sum: Cagliari secured a crucial victory in their battle against relegation with a hard-fought win over Monza, who struggled even before the dismissal of Danilo D’Ambrosio. arts.ttl: Serie A | Monza v Cagliari: Match Preview
arts.sum: As the new year begins, Monza and Cagliari find themselves in a precarious position in Serie A, both desperate for points as they battle against relegation. Their upcoming clash on Sunday at the U-Power Stadium will be crucial for both teams, who ended 2024 with four consecutive defeats. arts.ttl: Monza sack manager Nesta and appoint Bocchetti
arts.sum: Serie A side Monza appoint Salvatore Bocchetti as their new manager after sacking Alessandro Nesta on Monday.
